posts.post_content:
Hello...........For sale are these pair of T200 Fatima team cards. Prices are delivered...

Cleveland.....I would grade the card stock as GD to VG with lower border wear. I don't see any major or even moderate creases. Price reflects underexposed image.....$SOLD

Philadelphia Americans.....a couple creases and the small piece missing from top border, but a decent exposure and several HOF's.....$SOLD

Prices are delivered via the USPS. Payment by Paypal 'gift' preferred. PM me or email me at mattpienta at yahoo dot com with questions or to purchase. Thanks.........Matt
